title: [综合]Epicus Clans——史诗公会[1.8]
author: q211316907
txt_content:
本帖最后由 1582952890 于 2017-9-16 18:14 编辑 

咋感觉这插件与mcbbs里的有点相似

介绍:
作者:这个插件可以创造公会、邀请加入公会、T人、列出所有公会、退出公会等

我:这是个公会插件

特色:
公会聊天
不能伤害公会成员

这是收费插件
价格:4EUR大概30元

指令:
创造一个公会
/team create <name>
邀请某人
/team invite <player>
接受加公会请求
/team accept
拒绝请求
/team deny
删除公会
/team delete (然后需要输入公会名字来确认删除)
公会信息
/team info
列出公会
/team list
离开公会
/team leave
邀请玩家共用背包？Invite players using inventory

/team players invite
重载配置
/clanpl reload
公会聊天
/ce 要说的话

权限
ALL PERMS = clans.*  #所有权限
CREATE CLAN = clans.create #创造权限
DELETE CLAN = clans.delete #删除权限
INVITE CLAN = clans.invite #邀请权限
KICK CLAN = clans.kick #提出权限
ACCEPT INVITE = clans.accept #接受权限
DECLINE INVITE = clans.decline #拒绝权限
LEAVE CLAN = clans.leave #离开权限
CLAN INFO = clans.info #显示信息权限
CLAN LIST = clans.list #列出公会权限
PLAYERS INVITE = clans.players #邀请共用背包权限
CLAN PL = clan.reload #重载权限

config:
PrefixClan: true


NOT_ENOUGH_ARGS: '&4>> &cInsufficient arguments.'
ALREADY_HAS_CLAN: '&4>> &cYou already have a team.'
CLAN_NAME_TOO_LONG: '&4>> &cThe names have to be 6 digits or less.'
CLAN_NAME_INVALID: '&4>> &cThe teams can have names and numbers.'
NO_PERMISSION: '&4>> &eYou do not have permissions to use this command.'
CLAN_DISBANDED: '&2>> &aYour team has been eliminated correctly.'
CLAN_DISBAND_CANCELLED: '&4>> &cThe elimination of your team has been cancelled.'
NO_CLAN_PERMISSION: '&4>> &cYou need a clan to &e{0} &cuse this command.'
MEMBER_TAG: '&eMember'
OFFICER_TAG: '&9Official'
LEADER_TAG: '&cLeader'
SELF_NOT_IN_CLAN: '&4>> &cYou do not have any team.'
DISBAND_CONFIRMATION: '&4>> &cWrite in the chat the name of your clan for comfirm.'
PLAYER_SEARCH_MULTIPLE_RESULTS: '&2>> &aFound &e{0}&a: [&e{1}&a]'
PLAYER_SEARCH_NO_RESULTS: '&4>> &cAny command named  - &e{0}'
ALREADY_HAS_INVITATION: '&4>> &cThis player already have a pending request to join
  the team.'
SENDEE_INVITE_SENT: |-
  &2>> &aYou have recivied a team invite &e{0}&a for &e{1}&a.
  &2>> &aUsa &e/team accept&a to join.
INVITEE_ALREADY_IN_CLAN: '&4>> &e{0} &calready have a team or is in the same of you.'
NO_PENDING_REQUESTS: '&4>> &cYou do not have pending requests.'
CLAN_PLAYER_WELCOME: '&2>> &aSay hello to new memeber!, &e{0}&a!'
JOINED_CLAN: '&2>> &aYou joined to &e{0}&a!'
DECLINED_INVITATION: '&4>> &cYou denied the request to join &e{0}&c'
CLAN_ALREADY_EXISTS: '&4>> &cThe name &e{0}&c is already in use.'
CLAN_CREATED: '&2>> &e{0}&a has created succesfuly.'
HELP_HEADER: '&a========== &e[ &aTEAMS&e ]&a =========='
CLAN_ACCEPT_INVITE: '&2>> &e{0} &ahas accepted the request to join.'
CLAN_DECLINE_INVITE: '&4>> &e{0} &chas denied the request to join.'
CLAN_SEND_INVITE: '&2>> &e{0} &ainvited a &e{1} &a to the team.'
LEADER_LEAVE: "&4>> &cYou are the leader of &e{0}&c, yo can't leave.\n&4>>&c Give\
  \ the leader using &e/team transfer <player>\n&4>>&c or delete it using &e/team\
  \ delete "
KICKED_CLAN: '&4>> &e{0}&c has been kicked from team&e {1}&c! &e:O'
KICKED_PLAYER: '&4>> &eYou&c have been kicked from &e{0}&c.'
CLAN_MESSAGE: '&3>>&b {0}&3: &b{1}'
NOT_IN_CLAN: '&4>>&e {0} &cis not in your team.'
LIST_CLAN: '&2>> &e{0} &a(&e{1}&a)'
LIST_CLAN_TOTAL: '&2>>&a List of teams &e&l-&e {0}'
CHAT_TAG_FORMAT: '&a[&e{0}&a] {1}'
CHAT_SITAG_FORMAT: '&a[&e{0}&a] '
CHAT_NO_TAG_FORMAT: '&a {1}'
CHAT_NO_TAG_FORMAT_NO_PLAYER: '&a '
CHAT_ROLE_FORMAT: '*'
INFO_DIVIDER: '&a========================='
INFO_NAME_CLAN: '&2>> &aName &e&l-&e {0}'
INFO_COUNT: '&2>> &e(&a{0}&e/&a{1}&e)&a members online.'
INFO_NAME_PLAYER: '&2>> {0}{1} &e&l-&e {2}'
INFO_INVITE_COUNT: '&2>> &aPending Requests &e&l- &e{0}'
INFO_INVITE_PLAYER: '&2>> &e{0} &a(&e{1}&a)'
DEFINE_FAKE_NAME: '&cYou must define a fake name.'
CHAT_TAG_FORMAT_NO_CLAN_NAME: '&a[&e{0}&a] '
NO_FORMATING_TEXT_TYPE: '&cYou can not write your name using this type of formating text.'
NAME_NAME: '&bYour name now is '
REAL_NAME: '&cNow your name is your realname'
NAME_TOO_LONG: '&cYour name is too long.'

计划更新:
- Add a config message. - 添加config信息 完成
- Add a gui to manager the clan. - 添加gui管理公会 完成

哎这插件....
